TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RepeaterItem extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer

Docs.summary: Represents an item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A RepeaterItem object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.
The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
You can use a RepeaterItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use a RepeaterItem object to display the contents of each data item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
[!code-cs[Classic RepeaterItem Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_107_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[Classic RepeaterItem Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_107_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 itemIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the item in the control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
[!code-cs[Classic RepeaterItem.RepeaterItem Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/2b7c8067-237f-45b1-9ed3-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic RepeaterItem.RepeaterItem Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/2b7c8067-237f-45b1-9ed3-_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object DataItem { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a data item associated with the object in the control.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.

Docs.summary: Gets the index of the item in the control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
Docs.value: The index of the item in the control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the ItemIndex property to display the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
[!code-cs[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_103_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_103_1.aspx)]

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The following table lists the different item types.
|Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Header|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Footer|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Item|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |AlternatingItem|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |SelectedItem|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |EditItem|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Separator|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Pager|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.|
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the ItemType property to determine the item type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control. The order that items are created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are displayed along with the item type.
[!code-cs[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_781_1.aspx)] [!code-vb[Classic RepeaterItem.ItemType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_781_1.aspx)]
